content.question: Which of the following situations describes an approach-avoidance conflict?

choices.label: Mark must decide which of two attractive job offers to accept.
Nine-year-old Carl must decide which of two distasteful chores to do to avoid being punished by his parents.
Fred must select one menu item from among several at a popular restaurant.
Anna must decide whether to buy a used car that is in her price range but has several mechanical problems.

content.answer: Anna must decide whether to buy a used car that is in her price range but has several mechanical problems.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
